Articles.Content:
DAMNNNNN!!!!! I LAUNCH A INTERSTELLAR PROBE ANDD IT RUNS OUTTA POWER! I LAUNCH A LUNAR LANDER AND IT (Censored) FLIPS OVER ON THE MOON! I LAUNCH A (Censored)(Censored)(Censored) ROVER TO THE (Censored) MOON, AND IT ALSO (Censored) FLIPS OVER! (Censored)! (Censored)! *punch myself in face. repeat. repeat until nosebleed and black eye* GAHHHHHHHHHH! (Censored)! (Censored)!

Sorry, just had to get that outta my system. Now, I have to stifle my bleeding in the nose, its pretty bad. I might've broke it.

You should get yourself checked out for tourette syndrome.

Seriously though I do this all the time. I just had to dock part of my space station that only got power through the use of an engine, so I had to burn regularly and that was annoying. I succeeded though.

Um......... O_o

Sorry, my anger levels reached a Critical Point. If I had'nt released it in some way, the force of my anger would have obliberated everything in a 8LY range of earth.

You made an interstellar probe?

To which star did you want to send it?

You made an interstellar probe?

To which star did you want to send it?

The bright one.

Although the frustration is understandable in this case, the thread does otherwise have no real purpose.

Closed.
